HOME.page.title.message: OOMOL - AI Workflow Automation For Developers

HOME.FirstScreen.script.message: No new concepts to learn—just **write functions and reference libraries** like you always do to create blocks. **Drag and drop them into workflows** to efficiently build new features. Publish as **APIs, MCP tools, or automation** to turn ideas into products instantly.

HOME.ValueProps.localCompute.title.message: Turn Local Compute Into Your Private AI Cloud

HOME.ValueProps.localCompute.description.message: Run workflows on your own PC or NAS. Leverage idle CPU/GPU resources, share them with others, or scale to OOMOL Cloud anytime.

HOME.ValueProps.workflowAPI.title.message: Develop With Workflows, Deliver as APIs

HOME.ValueProps.workflowAPI.description.message: Create function blocks, assemble workflows, and publish them as REST or MCP APIs — automatically, with no server code required.

HOME.ValueProps.aiNative.description.message: AI-assisted block generation, vibe coding workflow blocks, and deep VSCode integration make development fast and flexible.

HOME.CoreFeatures.subtitle.message: Boosting efficiency across the entire development and deployment pipeline

HOME.CoreFeatures.workflow.title.message: 01｜Node as Function: No New Framework to Learn

HOME.CoreFeatures.workflow.description.message:
In oomol, a node is a function. Every line of code you write can become a capability component.

• Clear input/output definitions, external calls work like using an API
• Reference any open-source library, zero bottlenecks for feature expansion
• Native VSCode experience
• AI auto-generates nodes + Vibe Coding Block accelerates development

HOME.CoreFeatures.container.description.message:
IDE with built-in container environment, ready to use anytime.

• No environment setup required, works out of the box
• Strong isolation, doesn't pollute host machine
• Local environment identical to cloud environment

HOME.CoreFeatures.container.highlight1.message: Write and deploy to cloud immediately, no more debugging "environment inconsistency" issues

HOME.CoreFeatures.mcp.title.message: 03｜Device as Server: Put Idle Computing Power to Work

HOME.CoreFeatures.mcp.description.message:
Combining container and reverse proxy technology to assign domain names directly to devices.

• Personal computers & NAS become servers instantly
• GPU value no longer wasted (supports WSL2 calling Nvidia GPU)
• Private deployment + remote access anytime

HOME.CoreFeatures.mcp.highlight1.message: Turn all your devices into development resources

HOME.CoreFeatures.vscode.description.message:
Workflows and nodes can both be published as callable capabilities:

• Serverless API services
• MCP tools, directly integrated with AI
• Timer / Trigger automation processes

HOME.CoreFeatures.vscode.highlight1.message: Create capabilities that can be used by any system

HOME.Lifecycle.subtitle.message: From build to delivery, all-in-one development experience

HOME.Lifecycle.step1.subtitle.message: Design and implement workflows in OOMOL Studio

HOME.Lifecycle.step1.description.message: Create projects in OOMOL Studio, define functional nodes by installing ready-made Blocks from community or coding your own, then drag and drop to compose visual workflows with full AI assistance from design to production.

HOME.Lifecycle.step2.subtitle.message: Share with community, or manage as personal capability library

HOME.Lifecycle.step2.description.message: Choose to publish your packages publicly or privately — keep private packages to build your own modular capability library for reuse, or share them publicly in the community for others to benefit from your work.

HOME.Lifecycle.step3.subtitle.message: Run on local, private host or cloud

HOME.Lifecycle.step3.description.message: Deploy locally on your PC or Mac for personal use and sharing, use headless mode on NAS or server containers for long-term running, or deploy to Cloud Serverless with one click for hassle-free API hosting.

HOME.Lifecycle.step4.subtitle.message: Transform into capabilities usable by both users and AI

HOME.Lifecycle.step4.description.message: Transform your workflows into external API services and interactive user applications, MCP Tools that AI can directly invoke, or automated workflows that run on schedules or triggers.

HOME.WhyOomol.subtitle.message: Compare with other tools and see how OOMOL redefines developer experience

HOME.PdfCraft.title.message: Open Source Project Built on OOMOL: PDF-Craft

HOME.PdfCraft.subtitle.message: Experience the power of local computing with our flagship open source project built on OOMOL

HOME.PdfCraft.description.message: PDF-Craft is OOMOL's official open source PDF to eBook conversion tool with 3000+ GitHub stars. Run it locally for free, share with friends via OOMOL, or use the official API service — there's always a service that fits you.

HOME.PdfCraft.feature2.message: Built on DeepSeek OCR, advanced model

HOME.PdfCraft.feature3.message: Professional team maintenance, open source and service in parallel

HOME.PdfCraft.traditional.step1.message: Prepare a PC with RTX 3060 or higher GPU

HOME.PdfCraft.traditional.step2.message: Install OOMOL Studio for free local deployment

HOME.PdfCraft.traditional.step3.message: Use Mini App or Flow to run

HOME.BrandAssets.subtitle.message: OOMOL Trademarks and Logos Must Not Be Modified or Used for Anything Other Than Representing OOMOL Inc.

HOME.Scenes.subtitle.message: From GPU computing sharing to AI Agent toolchains, explore oomol's powerful application scenarios

HOME.Scenes.gpu-sharing.inner.message: Share your RTX 4090 at home with your team remotely via FRP protocol. Supports NVIDIA GPU access through WSL2, enables P2P computing sharing, train models at night, share computing power during the day.

HOME.Scenes.mcp-server.inner.message: Develop custom MCP tools for Claude Desktop. Generate functions through visual workflows, automatically support MCP protocol, let AI Agents call your services directly.

HOME.Scenes.data-api.inner.message: Turn local Python scripts into API services with one click. Combine pandas, numpy and other data analysis libraries, package with containers, automatically generate RESTful API interfaces.

HOME.Scenes.ai-image-service.inner.message: Deploy Stable Diffusion inference service. Utilize local GPU computing power, provide image generation API externally through FRP, support multi-model switching and custom parameters.

HOME.Scenes.iot-control.inner.message: Remotely control Raspberry Pi and IoT devices through FRP. Build workflows to orchestrate smart home, achieve remote monitoring, data collection and automation control.

HOME.Scenes.agent-toolchain.inner.message: Combine multiple MCP Tools to build expert Agents. Integrate capabilities like data query, file processing, API calls to create domain-specific intelligent assistants.

HOME.Scenes.data-science.inner.message: Create powerful AI tools for video processing, including automated transcription, translation, subtitling, and content analysis using advanced AI models and intuitive visual workflows.

HOME.Scenes.media-processing.inner.message: A multimedia editing toolkit powered by FFmpeg, supporting video editing, format conversion, audio processing, and more.

HOME.Scenes.ai-image-edit.inner.message: Edit and transform images with text instructions using AI models. Easily change objects, adjust scenes, or add creative effects.

HOME.Scenes.ai-vibe-coding.inner.message: With AI Vibe Coding, just describe what you need — AI will automatically generate complete workflows and nodes, letting you build powerful AI tools quickly and easily, no programming required.

HOME.Scenes.drag-drop-manual.inner.message: Easily build custom workflows with a simple drag-and-drop interface, giving you full control over every node and connection — ideal for creating tailored AI tools.

HOME.Scenes.text-processing.inner.message: Intelligent text analysis and processing, including sentiment analysis, keyword extraction, text summarization, translation, and content generation for efficient document workflows.

HOME.Scenes.zip-archive-manipulation.inn.message: A professional ZIP archive toolkit covering compression, extraction, encryption, encoding conversion, and a variety of ZIP file operations.

HOME.Scenes.txt-to-epub.inner.message: Convert TXT files into beautifully formatted EPUB eBooks.

HOME.Scenes.pdf-processing.inner.message: A comprehensive PDF toolkit that supports merging, splitting, OCR, form filling, security management, and more.

HOME.Scenes.data-analysis.inner.message: Analyze tabular data with AI and generate customized charts based on your needs.

HOME.Scenes.audio-processing.inner.message: Professional audio processing tools supporting speech recognition, audio enhancement, noise reduction, music generation, and sound analysis for complete audio solutions.

HOME.Scenes.automation.inner.message: Build intelligent automation workflows connecting various applications and services for automated task execution, data synchronization, and business process optimization.

HOME.Scenes.web-scraping.inner.message: Intelligent web data extraction tools supporting dynamic content retrieval, data cleaning, and structured storage for easy access to web data.

HOME.Scenes.api-integration.inner.message: Seamlessly connect various third-party services and APIs for data exchange, feature integration, and business collaboration to build powerful integration solutions.

HOME.Scenes.content-generation.inner.message: AI-powered content creation tools supporting article writing, image generation, video production, and creative design to unleash unlimited creative potential.

HOME.Create.title.message: From Creation to Deployment, All-in-One Development Experience

HOME.Create.subtitle.message: Create Workflow → Generate Package → Publish to Community → Flexible Deployment (Local FRP / Cloud API)

HOME.Products.subtitle.message: Explore the three core products in the OOMOL ecosystem, covering the complete AI tool lifecycle from creation to sharing to usage.

HOME.Products.studio.description.message: OOMOL's AI tool creation platform. The core advantage lies in: retaining the unlimited creative ability of traditional programming while having the convenience of low-code development, allowing users to efficiently build various AI tools.

HOME.Products.hub.description.message: AI tool sharing community. The best platform to discover, share, and get inspired.

HOME.Products.chat.description.message: Intelligent conversation tool. Use various AI features through natural language interaction.

HOME.CommunityShare.subtitle.message: Join our vibrant community to share your creations, discover amazing tools, and collaborate with fellow creators.

HOME.CommunityShare.hub.description.message: Discover and share AI tools with the community. Find inspiration and showcase your creations.

HOME.CommunityShare.github.description.message: Contribute to open source projects, report issues, and collaborate with developers worldwide.

HOME.CommunityShare.discord.description.message: Connect with other creators, get real-time support, and participate in community discussions.

HOME.Features.subtitle.message: Everything you need to create, customize, and share AI tools - no coding required.

HOME.Features.intuitive-interaction.inne.message: Build AI tools with simple drag-and-drop. No coding knowledge required.

HOME.Features.pre-installed-environment..message: Everything is pre-configured. Start creating AI tools immediately.

HOME.Features.programming-friendly.inner.message: Download and run. No complex setup or dependency management.

HOME.Features.support-sharing.inner.message: Share your AI tools with one click. Others can use them instantly.

HOME.Features.block-sharing.inner.message: Build once, use everywhere. Create reusable AI components for the community.

HOME.Ecosystem.subtitle.message: From local development to cloud deployment, complete AI tool lifecycle

HOME.Ecosystem.studio.description.message: VSCode-integrated visual editor with AI-assisted development and local container runtime.

HOME.Ecosystem.hub.description.message: Open package sharing community, publish, browse and install Blocks, one-click dependency integration.

HOME.Ecosystem.cloud.description.message: One-click deployment to cloud, providing RESTful and MCP API protocols, with metering and billing support.

HOME.Ecosystem.chat.description.message: AI chat assistant based on MCP Tools, combine Tools to build expert Agents, multi-model support.

HOME.Guide.subtitle.message: Build AI tool ecosystem with global developers, share experience, get support, and contribute to open source.

HOME.Guide.github.description.message: Participate in open source projects, contribute code, report issues, and collaborate with developers worldwide.

HOME.Guide.discord.description.message: Real-time communication, get technical support, share experiences, and meet like-minded developers.

HOME.Guide.docs.description.message: Complete API docs, sample code, best practices, get started with oomol development quickly.

HOME.Guide.project-1.description.message: AI-powered video translation and subtitle generation

HOME.Guide.project-8.description.message: Extract and structure data from documents with AI

HOME.Guide.project-10.description.message: Various feature sets of the SiliconFlow platform

HOME.Built-in.subtitle.message: Use a single OOMOL API Token to quickly access various common APIs and mainstream LLMs. Simpler, more unified development experience.

HOME.Built-in.code.python.message:
from oocana import Context

#region generated meta
import typing
Inputs = typing.Dict[str, typing.Any]
Outputs = typing.Dict[str, typing.Any]
#endregion

async def main(params: Inputs, context: Context) -> Outputs | None:

    # Fusion API Base URL
    api_url = "https://fusion-api.oomol.com/v1/fal-nano-banana-edit/submit"

    # LLM Base URL, can use openai sdk
    llm_base_url = "https://llm.oomol.com/v1"

    # Get OOMOL token from context (no need for manual API key input)
    api_token = await context.oomol_token()

    return {
      # "output": "output_value"
    }

HOME.Community.open-source.subtitle.message: OOMOL is an open-source company dedicated to promoting collaboration and enhancing existing open-source tools and communities.

FEATURES.title.message: All the features that you need

FEATURES.description.message: Easy drag-and-drop workflows, professional code editor, and elegant data visualization.

FEATURES.sceneOne.content-1.message: Build workflows with simple drag-and-drop Blocks to fit your needs.

FEATURES.sceneOne.content-2.message: Automatically offer UI components based on parameter types for easier use.

FEATURES.sceneOne.content-3.message: An intuitive UI helps users clearly understand the system’s status.

FEATURES.sceneOne.content-4.message: Readable logs with clear sequence and explicit status.

FEATURES.sceneTwo.content-5.message: Built-in Python and Node.js with support for open-source library installation.

FEATURES.sceneTwo.content-6.message: Based on Visual Studio Code with code completion, highlighting, and AI tips.

FEATURES.sceneTwo.content-7.message: Each node is a function—customize them easily if you know programming.

FEATURES.block-1.title.message: Containerized development environment for seamless cross-system workflow sharing.

FEATURES.block-2.title.message: Protect local environment and data security through secure isolation.

FEATURES.block-3.title.message: Unified Linux environment, easy image deployment to cloud.

FEATURES.block-4.title.message: Share workflow templates for easy scenario application and secondary development.

FEATURES.block-5.title.message: Share Block library with connectable, ready-to-use functions.

FEATURES.block-6.title.message: Code synced to GitHub for collaborative development and upkeep.

PRICING.subscription.subtitle.message: Choose the right plan for you and enjoy more features and services

PRICING.subscription.free.description.message: Perfect for individual developers handling all resources themselves

CREATE.description.message: OOMOL's AI tool creation platform. The core advantage lies in: retaining the unlimited creative ability of traditional programming while having the convenience of low-code development, allowing users to efficiently build various AI tools.

STUDIO.hero.description.message: We heard developers' voices: traditional workflow platforms make simple things complicated. OOMOL Studio changes everything.

STUDIO.painPoints.title.message: Three Pain Points of Traditional Workflow Tools

STUDIO.painPoints.subtitle.message: As developers, we know exactly how frustrating these problems are

STUDIO.painPoints.learningCurve.descript.message: Learning the platform's interaction and design concepts, simple if-else logic becomes complicated with drag-and-drop components. Problems that could be solved with one line of code require time to understand the platform's abstract concepts.

STUDIO.painPoints.extension.description.message: Problems that could be solved by importing an open-source library in programming become as complex as rocket science in workflow platforms. Want to extend functionality? Check if the platform supports it first—if not, you're stuck.

STUDIO.painPoints.toolSwitching.descript.message: Even if the platform provides scripting, you have to write code in a clunky web editor instead of your familiar VSCode. You lose code completion, debugging tools, and various extensions, significantly reducing development efficiency.

STUDIO.solutions.subtitle.message: We redesigned the workflow development experience based on developers' actual needs

STUDIO.solutions.functions.title.message: Nodes as Functions, Zero Barrier for Libraries

STUDIO.solutions.functions.description.message: In OOMOL Studio, nodes are functions. You don't need to learn any new concepts—write code in familiar ways and import any open-source library. Need a feature? Just npm install.

STUDIO.solutions.functions.highlight.message: No new concepts, no ceiling. Create workflows like writing code.

STUDIO.solutions.vscode.title.message: Built on VSCode, Inherit Your Coding Habits

STUDIO.solutions.vscode.description.message: OOMOL Studio is built on VSCode, so you can write node code in your familiar editor. Code completion, debugging tools, Git integration, various extensions... all your familiar development experience is here.

STUDIO.solutions.vscode.highlight.message: Familiar editor, familiar shortcuts, zero adaptation cost.

STUDIO.solutions.container.title.message: Built-in Container, Consistent Environment for Easy Deployment

STUDIO.solutions.container.description.message: Built-in container environment ensures local development is identical to server environment. Write code and run it directly without worrying about 'works on my machine'. Network proxy turns your device into a personal server, zero-cost task launching.

STUDIO.solutions.container.highlight.message: Local is production, no deployment pitfalls. Idle devices can serve too.

STUDIO.hero.description.old.message: Visual Workflow + Full Code with VSCode, Build and Share AI Tools Fast

STUDIO.workflow.subtitle.message: Create Workflow → Generate Package → Publish to Community → Flexible Deployment

STUDIO.workflow.step1.description.message: Drag-and-drop visual editor, VSCode-based Block coding

STUDIO.workflow.step2.description.message: Blocks + Flows auto-packaging, MCP interface support

HEADLESS.hero.description.message: OOMOL Headless is essentially delivering the OOMOL Studio runtime environment to developers as a container image. Deploy freely, no lock-in.

HEADLESS.philosophy.subtitle.message: We understand developers' concerns about commercial lock-in. OOMOL respects your will and lets technology return to purity.

HEADLESS.philosophy.freedom.desc.message: Your code, your device. Whether it's a personal NAS, private server, or public cloud, run it wherever you want.

HEADLESS.philosophy.opensource.desc.message: We open-sourced the OOMOL Runtime core code. Code is Law—this is our direct answer to 'refusing excessive commercialization'.

HEADLESS.philosophy.community.desc.message: No hidden terms, no forced upgrades. We are committed to building a developer ecosystem where everyone can use it with peace of mind and build happily together.

HEADLESS.useCases.subtitle.message: Flexible deployment for different runtime environments

HEADLESS.useCase.docker.description.message: One command to install, supports mainstream Linux distributions and NAS systems

HEADLESS.useCase.cloud.description.message: Easy deployment to Alibaba Cloud, AWS, Tencent Cloud and other platforms

HEADLESS.useCase.ci.description.message: Integrate into automation workflows for continuous deployment and testing

HEADLESS.useCase.api.description.message: Publish workflows as API services for other applications to call

HEADLESS.features.package.description.message: Complete package lifecycle management from installation to uninstallation

HEADLESS.features.package.feature1.message: Develop in Studio, deploy in Headless

HEADLESS.features.remote.description.message: Web interface management, access anytime, anywhere

HOME.Products.headless.description.message: Run OOMOL applications on servers and NAS devices

HOME.Scenes.dataScience.inner.message: Build end-to-end pipelines from data cleaning to model training to visualization, supporting pandas, scikit-learn, and GPU-accelerated deep learning.

HOME.Scenes.multimedia.inner.message: Batch video transcoding, auto multi-language subtitles, PDF generation. Leverage ffmpeg, Pillow and more to build efficient media processing pipelines.

HOME.Scenes.aiAgent.inner.message: Convert Blocks into AI-callable tools via MCP protocol, composing specialized Agents. Integrate data querying, file processing, API calls and more.

HOME.Scenes.apiPublish.inner.message: Package workflows as RESTful APIs or Chatbot interfaces, deploy to OOMOL Cloud with one click, auto-generating API docs and test UI.

HOME.Scenes.enterprise.inner.message: Docker containerized deployment to private cloud or K8s clusters, supporting CI/CD pipelines for continuous delivery and operations of enterprise-grade API services.

HOME.ProductComparison.subtitle.message: From local development to enterprise deployment, OOMOL provides flexible product formats to meet different scenarios. 3 Modes, One Experience.

HOME.ChatAgent.description.message: OOMOL Chat is the agent interface powered by your own blocks. Every block, workflow, or API becomes an MCP tool the agent can call.

HOME.ProductComparison.studio.scenario.message: Personal project debugging, rapid team sharing, make full use of idle GPUs (e.g., PCs with Nvidia 4090)

HOME.ProductComparison.studio.tech.message: Ready to use with local installation, built-in container environment, one-click connectivity to run as online server

HOME.ProductComparison.headless.scenario.message: Highly customizable API services, automated workflow deployment, private cloud environments

HOME.ProductComparison.headless.tech.message: Supports Docker and open-source infrastructure, deeply customizable, flexible integration, controllable security

HOME.ProductComparison.cloud.capability.message: Officially Provided Service, Performance Optimized to the Max

HOME.ProductComparison.cloud.scenario.message: Rapid launch for SMB teams, no infrastructure management. Simple with zero mental overhead.

HOME.ProductComparison.cloud.tech.message: On-demand scaling, zero operations overhead, instant production deployment

CLOUD.hero.description.message: You write the Function Block, leave the rest to OOMOL. Free yourself from operations and let your ideas take flight instantly.

CLOUD.painPoints.subtitle.message: We know the struggle as developers

CLOUD.painPoints.description.message: Coding is creative joy, but delivering code is often a burden. Servers, environments, deployment, UI design... these roadblocks kill many genius ideas. We want to change that.

CLOUD.solution.subtitle.message: Write the Block, OOMOL handles the rest

CLOUD.modes.library.description.message: Share Blocks with others or compose them into new features. Let your code be the foundation of community innovation.

CLOUD.modes.serverless.description.message: One-click deploy as Serverless API. No Ops, auto-scaling, providing stable API services for others.

CLOUD.modes.mcp.description.message: Publish via MCP (Model Context Protocol), allowing AI Agents to directly call your functions and connect to the intelligent world.

CLOUD.pricing.title.message: Pay Per Call, No Upfront Cost

CLOUD.pricing.description.message: No expensive server fees, no complex prepaid plans. We charge by call count. Save money, save effort, and focus on the joy of programming.

CLOUD.opensource.subtitle.message: OOMOL's underlying runtime kernel is fully open source, giving you complete control over your deployment environment

CLOUD.opensource.description.message: We believe in the power of open source. OOMOL's virtual machine and runtime core code are completely open source, allowing you to freely view, modify, and deploy. Whether it's a personal NAS, private server, or public cloud, you have complete deployment freedom.

CLOUD.opensource.ovm.description.message: Cross-platform virtual machine manager providing unified container runtime for OOMOL

CLOUD.opensource.ovm-core.description.message: Core runtime library for OVM, handling container lifecycle and resource management

CLOUD.opensource.ovm-win.description.message: OVM implementation for Windows platform, supporting WSL2 and Hyper-V

CLOUD.opensource.ovm-mac.description.message: OVM implementation for macOS platform, based on Apple Virtualization Framework

STUDIO.hero.description.message: Local development environment for developers, VSCode-based visual programming tool with FRP protocol for P2P computing power sharing

HEADLESS.hero.description.message: Containerized deployment solution, packaging workflows as standalone Docker images for cloud servers, private clouds and K8s clusters

APP.new.hero.subtitle.message: The Last Mile of AI Product Delivery

APP.new.hero.description.message: Turn your Block functions into AI Chat skills and Applets instantly, without writing any UI code.

APP.new.concept.description.message: OOMOL automatically wraps your backend logic (Blocks) into frontend products. You focus on the function; we connect it to the user.

APP.new.chat.description.message: When user intent is vague, AI intelligently orchestrates your tools to solve the problem.

APP.new.chat.meta1.value.message: People who need to rapidly turn ideas into automated workflows

APP.new.chat.meta2.value.message: Build workflows step-by-step through conversation, like discussing with a colleague

APP.new.chat.devValue.message: Tools as Skills: Your functions become the AI's capabilities.

APP.new.applet.description.message: When user needs are clear, direct execution with parameters for efficiency.

APP.new.applet.meta1.value.message: Teams that need to publish, reuse, and share automation capabilities

APP.new.applet.meta2.value.message: Compose capability components into products, like building with LEGO

APP.new.applet.devValue.message: Function as App: Auto-generated UI, zero frontend code.

STUDIO.page.description.message: OOMOL Studio. Why we built OOMOL Studio the way we did.

STUDIO.manifesto.subtitle.message: We built OOMOL Studio because we were tired of choosing between "easy to use" and "powerful enough."

STUDIO.story.paragraph1.message: As engineers, we love automation. We love chaining tools together to build pipelines, agents, and data flows. But whenever we tried to use existing "Workflow Platforms," we hit a wall.

STUDIO.story.frustration.line1.message: "Why do I have to learn a proprietary JSON syntax just to write an if/else statement?"

STUDIO.story.frustration.line2.message: "Why can't I just import a library? Why do I have to wait for the platform to support it?"

STUDIO.story.frustration.line3.message: "Why am I coding in a textarea with no autocomplete?"

STUDIO.story.paragraph2.message: We realized that Low Code often meant High Frustration for professional developers. It abstracted away the things we actually liked: control, debugging, and the ecosystem.

STUDIO.story.paragraph3.message: So we decided to build something different. Not a "No-Code" toy, but a real IDE.

STUDIO.principle1.title.message: 1. Code is the Source of Truth

STUDIO.principle1.paragraph1.message: We didn't invent a new visual language. We simply visualize standard code.

STUDIO.principle1.paragraph2.message: In OOMOL, a Node is just a Function. The inputs are arguments, the outputs are return values.

STUDIO.principle1.paragraph3.message: You don't "configure" a node; you write a function. The UI is just a reflection of your code's signature.

STUDIO.principle2.paragraph1.message: We believe you shouldn't have to downgrade your environment just to use a visual tool.

STUDIO.principle2.paragraph2.message: That's why we embedded the full Monaco Editor (VS Code) into every node.

STUDIO.principle2.paragraph3.message: Intellisense, Type Checking, Linting, Formatting, and even full Debugging Protocol (DAP) support. It feels like home because it is home.

STUDIO.principle3.paragraph1.message: Traditional platforms run your code in a restricted, proprietary sandbox. If you need native Node.js modules or system-level tools, you're stuck.

STUDIO.principle3.paragraph2.message: OOMOL runs on Standard Docker Containers.

STUDIO.principle3.paragraph3.message: Need ffmpeg? apt-get install it. Need specific system dependencies? Just install them.
